channel.title: What, Why, How
channel.description: Recent content on What, Why, How

item.title: Restart
item.description: I finally overcame the innate resistance we all experience when forced to change and started migrating my projects and blog posts. This will take some time as I have to also update my old projects, which I likely wouldn’t have done if I hadn’t to move my contents to here. Setting things up took some effort, but I’m pleased with the better organization and centralization.
